name: Create a deployment status

previews.name: ant-man
previews.description:
The new `inactive` state, `log_url`, `environment_url`, and `auto_inactive` parameters are currently available for developers to preview. During the preview period, the API may change without advance notice. Please see the [blog post](/changes/2016-04-06-deployment-and-deployment-status-enhancements) for full details.

To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json

```

params.name: state
params.description:
The state of the status. Can be one of `error`, `failure`, `inactive`, `pending`, or `success`.  
**Note:** This parameter requires you to use the [`application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json`](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#enhanced-deployments) custom media type.

params.name: target_url
params.description: The target URL to associate with this status. This URL should contain output to keep the user updated while the task is running or serve as historical information for what happened in the deployment.

params.name: log_url
params.description:
This is functionally equivalent to `target_url`. We will continue accept `target_url` to support legacy uses, but we recommend modifying this to the new name to avoid confusion. Default: `""`  
**Note:** This parameter requires you to use the [`application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json`](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#enhanced-deployments) custom media type. **Note:** This parameter requires you to use the [`application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json`](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#enhanced-deployments) custom media type.

params.name: description
params.description: A short description of the status. Maximum length of 140 characters.

params.name: environment_url
params.description:
Sets the URL for accessing your environment. Default: `""`  
**Note:** This parameter requires you to use the [`application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json`](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#enhanced-deployments) custom media type. **Note:** This parameter requires you to use the [`application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json`](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#enhanced-deployments) custom media type.

params.name: auto_inactive
params.description:
Adds a new `inactive` status to all non-transient, non-production environment deployments with the same repository and environment name as the created status's deployment. Default: `true`  
**Note:** This parameter requires you to use the [`application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json`](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#enhanced-deployments) custom media type. **Note:** This parameter requires you to use the [`application/vnd.github.ant-man-preview+json`](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#enhanced-deployments) custom media type.
